title: Planned downtime on Sunday, Jul 10, 2022, 9-10am CEST
safeHtmlBody: We will upgrade our server infrastructure to ensure Aleph can continue to handle increasing workloads. Aleph will be unavailable during this time frame.

title: Degraded performance
safeHtmlBody: Aleph is currently experiencing degraded performance due to a higher than average number of datasets being ingested at this time

title: Resolved: Degraded ingest performance
